title: Why is data literacy important?
text: Consider how understanding data can impact the way you present it.

title: Data Literacy in Presentation
text: Think about the consequences of misunderstanding data when presenting it to others.

hintAnswer: You need to understand data in order to present it effectively.
title: Understanding Data's Role
text: Why is it essential to comprehend data before presenting it?
choices: You need to understand data in order to present it effectively.
Without data literacy, you can't be a data scientist.
You need to know statistics to work with data.
You need to be fluent in data in order to present it accurately.
